definition: surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: This became known as the “Easterlin paradox”.
sentences.chinese: 這就變成了廣爲人知的“伊斯特林的潘多拉之盒”。

sentences.english: The spirituality of the world of Pandora plays well.
sentences.chinese: 人們都能認可潘多拉星球的靈性。

sentences.english: But I think the main one is like Pandora, yeah.
sentences.chinese: 但是我覺得主要的這個像潘多拉。

sentences.english: Pandora is offlimits for all time.
sentences.chinese: 任何時候潘多拉都禁止入內。

sentences.english: Why iz Lunatic Pandora here now?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼瘋狂潘多拉現在會在這？

sentences.english: Pandora’s public offering brings some much-needed market glamour to the digital music business.
sentences.chinese: 潘多拉提供的內容給數碼音樂市場帶來了些許吸引力。

sentences.english: For the next three weeks, Chris and Pandora were inseparable .
sentences.chinese: 接下來的三週裏，克里斯和潘多拉變得難分難捨。

sentences.english: In the music space alone, Pandora has dozens of competitors.
sentences.chinese: 僅是音樂這一塊，“潘多拉”就有幾十個競爭者。

sentences.english: The 3Q fight only opens a pandora’s box.
sentences.chinese: 3Q大戰只是開啓了潘多拉魔盒而已。

sentences.english: The Pope may thus have opened Pandora’s Box.
sentences.chinese: 教皇已經打開了潘多拉的寶盒。

sentences.english: This is why I have called humans “Earth’s Pandoran species.”
sentences.chinese: 這正是爲什麼我把人類稱爲“地球的潘多拉物種”。

sentences.english: He hates Pandora, but loves the fight.
sentences.chinese: 他痛恨潘多拉，但酷愛戰鬥。

sentences.english: So what the hell was Tom doing going to Pandora?
sentences.chinese: 那麼湯姆去潘多拉到底要幹什麼？

definition: Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Poseidon, God of the sea in Greek mythology
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
Titan (race of deities in Greek mythology, moon of Saturn etc)
